# The `MCOperandInfo` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This holds information about one operand of a machine instruction, indicating the register class for register operands, etc. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::MCOperandInfo</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

This holds information about one operand of a machine instruction, indicating the register class for register operands, etc.

### RegClass {#ad3abf78805559fecd7642d0c57032c56}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>int16&#95;t llvm::MCOperandInfo::RegClass</>}>
This specifies the register class enumeration of the operand if the operand is a register.

If isLookupPtrRegClass is set, then this is an index that is passed to TargetRegisterInfo::getPointerRegClass(x) to get a dynamic register class.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/mcinstrdesc-h/#l00091">91</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/mcinstrdesc-h">MCInstrDesc.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
